<template>
    
</template>
<script>
import HeaderComponent from '@/components/HeaderComponent.vue';
import FooterComponent from '@/components/FooterComponent.vue';

export default {
    components: {
        HeaderComponent,
        FooterComponent,
    },
    methods: {
        openFilePicker(identificacion) {
            this.$refs[identificacion + 'FileInput'].click();
        }
    }
};
</script>
<style>
.ordenar img {
    display: block;
}

.ordenar button {
    display: block;
}

.ordenar {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
}
.btn1{
    background: #8BC34A;
}
template{
  background-image: url('../assets/oficios.jpg');
  background-size: cover;
}
</style>
